text: Is there a way to get automatic shadows on a face of a cube (projections)?

elements.text: Is there a way to get automatic shadows on a face of a cube (projections)?

text: Shadow mapping hasn't been implemented yet. I'd like a more robust system of adjusting the render pipeline before implementing more postprocessing.
